snippet: Taking advantage of perfect weather at Royal Lytham and St. Annes, Adam Scott of Australia grabbed the lead with a sparkling round of 64. Tiger Woods opened with four birdies on the front nine, but settled at three under, where he is tied with Rory...
abstract: Taking advantage of perfect weather at Royal Lytham and St. Annes, Adam Scott of Australia grabbed the lead with a sparkling round of 64. Tiger Woods opened with four birdies on the front nine, but settled at three under, where he is tied with Rory McIlroy, among others.

headline.main: Adam Scott Races to Lead in British Open First Round
